title: I submitted my Pixel for repair on 16 October it is appears it has been lost
content:
I submitted my pixel for repair under warranty on 16th October. Google confirmed it has been received on 17th, and have now said that is a mistake and it was never received.

I am now approaching 4 weeks without a working phone and all I keep getting are e-mails to confirm 'they are looking into my issue'

In the meantime i have had to purchase a new non-pixel smartphone.

Does anyone know how to escalate my issue to get a resolution?
